data.text: O! Yehowa, Mawu si biaa hlɔ̃,
Tso, o xexea me ƒe Ʋɔnudrɔ̃la,
O! Yehowa, va se ɖe ɣe ka ɣi
Wole nya tovowo gblɔm,
O! Yehowa, wogbã wò dukɔ la nyanyanya,
Wowu ahosiwo kple amedzrowo,
Wogblɔ be, “Yehowa mele ekpɔm o,
Mikpɔ nyuie, mi gegeme siwo le dukɔ la me,
Ɖe eya ame si wɔ to la mase nu oa?
Ɖe eya ame si hea to na dukɔwo la mahe to oa?
Yehowa nya amegbetɔ ƒe susu,
O, Yehowa, woayra ame si nèhe to na,
eye nèna gbɔdzɔe tso dzɔgbevɔ̃eŋkekewo me,
Elabena Yehowa magbe eƒe dukɔ la o,
Woagaɖo ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃ anyi ɖe dzɔdzɔenyenye dzi,
Ame ka atso ɖe ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ŋu nam?
Ɖe menye Yehowae kpe ɖe ŋunye o la,
Esi medo ɣli be,
Esi dzitsitsi yɔ menye la,
Ɖe fiazikpui madzɔmadzɔ
Wowɔa ɖeka ɖe ame dzɔdzɔewo ŋu,
Gake Yehowae nye nye mɔ sesẽ,
Aɖo woƒe nu vɔ̃wo teƒe na wo,
